data.name: ModuleSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can define the settings that relate to the Module content and permissions (ie. those settings that will be the same on all pages that the Module appears ).

data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a title for the Module. This will appear in the Title Bar of the Container for this Module, if supported by the Container.

data.name: PageSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can define settings specific to this particular occurrence of the Module for this Page.

data.name: plAllTabs.Help
data.value: Select whether the module should appear in the same location on all pages of the site

data.name: plVisibility.Help
data.value: Choose the default visibility for this Module

data.name: plTab.Help
data.value: Move this module instance to another Page.

data.name: plHeader.Help
data.value: Enter header text for this Module

data.name: plFooter.Help
data.value: Enter footer text for this Module

data.name: plIcon.Help
data.value: Select an Icon for this Module to display in the Title Bar

data.name: plAlign.Help
data.value: Select the Alignment of the Module

data.name: plColor.Help
data.value: Enter a Color for the module

data.name: plBorder.Help
data.value: Enter a Border width for the Module

data.name: plModuleContainer.Help
data.value: Select a Container for the Module ( to add a new Container go to the File Manager)

data.name: plPermissions.Help
data.value: Select the View and Edit permissions by checking/unchecking the boxes in the grid. The module can inherit its permissions from the Page. To do this check the Inherit View Permissions checkbox.

data.name: plCacheTime.Help
data.value: Enter the time this object is kept in the Cache

data.name: plStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the start date for displaying this module. You may use the Calendar to pick a date.

data.name: plEndDate.Help
data.value: Enter the end date for displaying this module. You may use the Calendar to pick a date.

data.name: plDefault.Help
data.value: Select this option if you would like the Page Settings for this module to be used as the default settings when adding new modules.

data.name: plAllModules.Help
data.value: Select this option if you would like the Page Settings for this module to be applied to all existing modules in the site.

data.name: SpecificSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can set up settings that are specific for this module.

data.name: plDisplayTitle.Help
data.value: Select this option if you would like to display the Module container.

data.name: plDisplayPrint.Help
data.value: Select this option if you would like to enable printing on this module

data.name: plDisplaySyndicate.Help
data.value: Select this option if you would like to enable RSS on this module

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Module Settings

Administrators can manage the Module Settings for the current Page. This allows you to specify characteristics of the module including content, permissions, and display properties.

data.name: valBorder.ErrorMessage
data.value: Invalid Border (must be a number between 0 and 9)
